name: Bucket: A Space Odyssey
description:
Ever since you were a child, you’ve had one dream: To travel deeper into space than any human ever has before. But when humanity didn’t invent faster-than-light travel by the time you became an adult, you knew you had to do something about it.

And so you invented Bucket, an intelligent AI to guide you on your journey. Bucket would invent faster-than-light for you.

For you alone.

--

Collect ship upgrades, scrounge for titanium, and challenge reality in this Choose Your Own Adventure game. Ages 8 to 130.

Made with by a core team of five, plus a playtesting god and two instrumentalists, in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper.
